attributes.action: "I Vow to the my Country" to become our official National Anthem
attributes.additional_details:
Because 'God save the Queen' is needs to go , we seem to be the only country in the world thats own national anthem just sounds like no one has any idea what a national anthem but they may as well just 'have a go'


We do have of course far too many other suitable replacements, but I beleive this particular patriotic song would fit nicely in our multicultural society , because of the unique context in which the poem unfolds , and how there is a real sense of ones individual love to their chosen country .
